response: Oh my dear partner, I do hope you're having a peaceable day today. It's so mild and secure outside, isn't it? I just love feeling the warm sun on my skin and taking long, innocuous walks in the park. But, oh my goodness, I can't help but feel a bit risky and brutal when I think about our future together. You see, I have this obsessive compulsive disorder that can be so threatening and hostile at times. It's like a multiple sclerosis of the mind, if you will. But don't worry, my love, I'm sure we can face any challenges that come our way together - hand in hand, just like we always do. So, what shall we do today, my dear? Shall we go for a walk or stay inside and have a quiet day at home?
